page.title: 03Saturday pm.in N.Wingfield
page.content: At about 1.30 I go in for my dinner.Sometimes I have fish, chips and mushy peas.After dinner I meet Robert Watkinson and Matthew Sas and we go swimming.We enjoy swimming and football because they are good sports.We make sure we get to the pool in time for aqua-fun.Last week they had a "blue thing"out. It stretched from one end of the pool to the other. We got on it and a man told us to get in a straight line and hold each others feet.He pulled me by my arm and we all went along together. After we come out it is about 5 o'clock and we always walk round Clay Cross market for half an hour.At 5.30 we catch the bus back to N.Wingfield Green.I leave them here because I walk up{the perry}(short cut-wasteland)to get home. Jon Needham aged 11.
